SEARCH
Package jpacman.model

Class Guest

java.lang.Object
jpacman.model.Guest
Direct Known Subclasses:
Food, MovingGuest, Wall
public abstract class Guest extends Object
Class containing responsibilities shared by all Guests.
Version:
$Id: Guest.java,v 1.9 2008/02/11 13:05:20 arie Exp $
Author:
Arie van Deursen; Jul 28, 2003

  • Constructor Details

    • Guest

      public Guest()
      Create a new Guest satisfying the class invariant.

  • Method Details

    • guestInvariant

      protected boolean guestInvariant()
      Returns:
      true iff the invariant for cell association holds.

    • getLocation

      public Cell getLocation()
      Returns:
      The location of this guest.

    • occupy

      public void occupy(Cell cell)
      Occupy a non-null, empty cell. Precondition: the current Guest must not have occupied another cell, and the target cell should be empty. Postcondition: both the cell and the guest have changed their pointers to reflect the occupation.
      Parameters:
      cell - New location for this guest.

    • deoccupy

      public Cell deoccupy()
      Remove the occupation link with this Guest's Cell association.
      Returns:
      The location that is now free, or null if the Guest didn't occupy a cell.

    • meetPlayer

      protected abstract boolean meetPlayer(PlayerMove aMove)
      The player would like to visit the cell occupied by this guest. Indicate whether this is possible, and modify the move's state to indicate what the effect of such a move would be. Precondition: the move object is non null and initializing.

      Parameters:
      aMove - theMove move object representing intended move and its effects.
      Returns:
      True iff this guest has no objection to the player taking his place.

    • guestType

      public abstract char guestType()
      Return a character code representing the type of guest.
      Returns:
      Type code for this guest.
